Container.Name: GridMind
Container.Overview: GridMind is a personal Tesla Powerwall 3 automation and monitoring app. Features a real-time animated power flow dashboard (Solar, Battery, Home, Grid, EV), EV charging integration with smart scheduling (TOU-aware, solar surplus, departure planner), solar generation forecasting, financial tracking with TOU rate optimization, Powerwall health monitoring with battery capacity estimation, Wall Connector status, and optional AI-powered energy insights via OpenAI. Includes automation rules, GridMind Optimize (smart peak export strategy), off-grid mode simulation, and email/webhook notifications. All configuration is done through the web UI -- no environment variables required. Requires a Tesla Developer App with Fleet API credentials.
